Control Name: REL 11.5 Send notiﬁcations when events impact availability
Control Statement: Notiﬁcations are sent upon the detection of signiﬁcant events, even if the issue caused by the event was automatically resolved.

control_attributes.Control: REL 11.5 Send notiﬁcations when events impact availability
control_attributes.Subcategory: How do you design your workload to withstand component failures?
